caption.title: Expected long-term changes in the spatial distribution of common ash and its pathogen using MaxEnt and NPPEN.
caption.p: Long-term quantitative changes (median and both first and third quartiles as shading) relative to 1992â€“2009 for H. fraxineus (in red), and common ash without (in green) and with (in blue) the interactive effect of H. fraxineus using ( a, c, e, g) MaxEnt and ( b, d, f, h) NPPEN for scenarios ( a, b) RCP2.6, ( c,d) RCP4.5, ( e, f) RCP6.0 and ( g, h) RCP8.5.
